name: Counter-PsyOps Strategies
description: Recognizing and neutralizing psychological influence tactics used against target populations.

cards.title: Detecting Psychological Manipulation
cards.description: Techniques for identifying subliminal and overt influence tactics.
cards.bulletpoints: Gaslighting indicators, false flag recognition, mass conditioning techniques
cards.summaryText: Build detection checklists that flag gaslighting tells, staged false flags, and conditioning loops before audiences internalize hostile narratives.

cards.title: Reversing Propaganda Effects
cards.description: Methods for countering enemy PsyOps and restoring critical thinking.
cards.bulletpoints: Deprogramming strategies, controlled narrative dismantling, truth injection techniques
cards.summaryText: Deploy deprogramming campaigns that dismantle hostile messaging, inject verified truths, and rebuild resilient public perception.
